last_episode_to_air.name: A Wild Ride
last_episode_to_air.overview: As The Core’s true purpose is revealed, the Hardy Boys and their friends must band together to save themselves, and the world, from an unheard-of technology that could forever change life as they know it.

name: The Hardy Boys
overview: When Frank and Joe Hardy arrive in Bridgeport, they set out to uncover the truth behind the recent tragedy that has changed their lives. In doing so, they stumble upon something much more sinister - something only the Hardy Boys can stop.
tagline: Solving mysteries is in their blood.

episodes.name: Welcome to Your Life
episodes.overview: Frank and Joe Hardy move to the small town of Bridgeport for the summer and set out to uncover the truth behind a recent family tragedy.

episodes.name: Where the Light Can't Find You
episodes.overview: Fenton leaves town to search for the missing Rupert Khan. Joe delivers a message for a shady stranger, and Frank connects Laura to a local legend and a mysterious object pulled from the sea.

episodes.name: Of Freedom and Pleasure
episodes.overview: A terrifying man tracks Joe to the carnival, where a curious new trinket grants Joe incredible luck. Frank tries to find out why Laura was so interested in a decades-old local mine collapse.

episodes.name: Secrets and Lies
episodes.overview: Joe tries to cover up his connection to a criminal and ends up learning his identity. While following Laura’s investigative footsteps, Frank learns his Grandmother is lying to him.

episodes.name: The Drop
episodes.overview: After an attempt to lure out the buyer of a twice-stolen object, Frank and Joe find themselves pursued by someone they believed to be dead. Their friends are welcomed onto the team.

episodes.name: In Plain Sight
episodes.overview: Frank and Callie grow closer during an entrance exam to a prestigious school, only to find more secrets. Joe and Biff decide to hide his lucky charm from a threatening pursuer. Fenton takes another step in his search.

episodes.name: A Figure in Hiding
episodes.overview: Frank and Callie look behind the veil at Rosegrave Prep and learn that Laura's investigation started in high school, while Joe tries to prove their conspiracy has a local police connection.

episodes.name: What Happened in Bridgeport
episodes.overview: The boys head back to school, but Frank and Callie have different takes on the new girl. Frank learns more about young Laura, while an old friend returns to offer Joe information...for a price.

episodes.name: The Key
episodes.overview: Frank and Joe exchange truths with their Grandmother and find a long-hidden secret in her home. Fenton finds what he's looking for. Meanwhile, other forces work against them all.

episodes.name: The Secret Room
episodes.overview: Taking a step farther than their mother did and learning the nature of the object at the heart of the mystery, Frank and Joe's unity fractures over what to do next. Tensions between Chet, Callie, Frank and Stacy reach a peak.

episodes.name: No Getting Out
episodes.overview: Trapped and lost, Biff and Joe’s friendship is tested. Frank can only help find them by revealing too much to people he can’t trust.

episodes.name: Eye to Eye
episodes.overview: Regaining possession of something long-lost, Gloria reasserts old power. Fenton returns and is stunned to see his sons in the middle of secrets that he, too, has uncovered. Frank enters an uneasy alliance, and climactic events are set in motion.

episodes.name: While the Clock Ticked
episodes.overview: The Hardy boys and the gang embark on a daring mission to finally uncover the truth… but in revealing the truth could they unleash a dark power beyond their control?

episodes.name: A Disappearance
episodes.overview: Frank and Joe Hardy return to detective work when a classmate goes missing.

episodes.name: Conflicting Reports
episodes.overview: Joe suspects Dennis’s girlfriend, Lucy, is hiding something about the night he went missing, and Frank realizes The Eye is trying to show him something about the case.

episodes.name: The Missing Camera
episodes.overview: When Frank is led to believe a local recluse is their prime suspect, the team attempts a risky break-in to retrieve the video camera Dennis lost in the woods.

episodes.name: A Clue on Film
episodes.overview: It’s a waiting game as Callie tries to repair Dennis’s damaged videotape, and the whole gang attends the annual Demon Night drive-in.

episodes.name: Heading for Destruction
episodes.overview: The gang races to stop a potential bombing at the Demon Day Parade, while Fenton makes a shocking discovery of his own.

episodes.name: Hunting an Intruder
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of the bombing, the team realizes Wilt’s may not have been the intended target.

episodes.name: The Doctor’s Orders
episodes.overview: When Dr. Burelli plans to move Dennis to another facility, Joe fears the worst and convinces Lucy, Biff and Phil to help him stop her.

episodes.name: A Midnight Scare
episodes.overview: Frank and Callie make a shocking revelation about the Project Midnight test subjects, while Joe impatiently tries to enlist the help of J.B. Cox to get the power out of Frank.

episodes.name: Captured!
episodes.overview: Joe conspires with J.B. to steal the relic from Stratemeyer Global and get the power out of Frank, but The Eye has other plans.

episodes.name: An Unexpected Return
episodes.overview: With Frank missing from the school dance, Joe and the gang must race against time to locate his whereabouts and stop the Shadow Man from completing his ultimate plan.

episodes.name: A Strange Inheritance
episodes.overview: When the gang learns the location of George Estabrook’s hidden Codexes, they must enlist the help of an unlikely ally to retrieve them before anyone else.

episodes.name: A Vanishing Act
episodes.overview: Betrayed by one of their own, the gang struggles to understand the meaning behind George Estabrook’s map and faces a shocking quid pro quo.

episodes.name: A Promise of Trouble
episodes.overview: The gang joins Callie at Rosegrave with hopes of saving Frank, but they’ll require the help of an old foe and The Power of The Eye.

episodes.name: The Crash
episodes.overview: With Frank back, the race is on to locate the third and final Relic, but the bad guys are hot on the Hardy Boys’ trail.

episodes.name: Revelation
episodes.overview: After a shocking blow, the gang must divide and conquer to determine the identity of Deep Voice and get The Core back.

episodes.name: The Spider's Net
episodes.overview: With the help of Drew, the gang makes a daring plan to retrieve The Core, but their loved ones’ lives hang in the balance.

episodes.name: At the Old House
episodes.overview: The Hardy Boys get what they want most and must race to deactivate The Core before it’s too late.

episodes.name: A Wild Ride
episodes.overview: As The Core’s true purpose is revealed, the Hardy Boys and their friends must band together to save themselves, and the world, from an unheard-of technology that could forever change life as they know it.
